definition: to send/to devote/to deliver/to cause/to convey

sentences.english: And you know what, the waste you exhale when you smoke is more toxic to cause cancer.
sentences.chinese: 你知道吗，你吸烟时呼出的废气更加具有致癌性质。

sentences.english: The AEL and combined carcinogen lists in the SHE office files are the sources for obtaining this information.
sentences.chinese: 安全部文件中的AEL和致癌列表是这类信息的来源。

sentences.english: One of the most powerful cancer-promoting food ingredients of all is called sodium nitrate.
sentences.chinese: 最能致癌的食品成份之一就是硝酸钠。

sentences.english: Conclusion Amosite granular dust has the effects of causing carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 结论颗粒状铁石棉粉尘具有致癌作用。

sentences.english: Secondhand smoke causes at least half the cases of lung cancer in non-smokers.
sentences.chinese: 二手烟会导致至少二分之一的不吸烟者致癌。

sentences.english: These heterocyclic amines and some other carcinogens too are very often found in meat products.
sentences.chinese: 在肉类产品中也会经常发现多环胺和其它一些致癌物。

sentences.english: Substances which are known to be carcinogenic in humans.
sentences.chinese: 已被认为对人类有致癌作用的物质。

sentences.english: Mild mutations in XPF cause the cancer - prone syndrome xeroderma pigmentosum.
sentences.chinese: XPF轻微突变导致致癌倾向综合征着色性干皮病。

sentences.english: Citrinin is a mycotoxin which can induce renal dysfunction, and it is tumorigenic.
sentences.chinese: 桔青霉素是能引起肾脏毒性的真菌毒素，并有致癌性。

sentences.english: The digested enzymes activate the cancer-causing HCAs.
sentences.chinese: 这些被消化的酶激活了致癌性杂环化合胺物质。

sentences.english: Benzene is a highly poisonous toxin that is also carcinogenic.
sentences.chinese: 苯是一种有高毒性的毒素，它会致癌。

sentences.english: Reports in the formula to point to, hydrolyzed vegetable protein may release the carcinogens.
sentences.chinese: 报道指，配方中的水解植物蛋白质有可能释放致癌物。

sentences.english: The airborne carcinogens are in the atmosphere as absorbed matter on soot particles.
sentences.chinese: 空气传播的致癌物在大气中是烟炱粒子上吸附的物质。

sentences.english: The enzymes detoxify the carcinogens, and are among the strongest cancer fighting substances available.
sentences.chinese: 生化酶可分解致癌物质，并在最强抗癌物质中使用。

sentences.english: This is because of the carcinogenic effect of asbestos particles.
sentences.chinese: 这是因为在致癌作用的石棉粒子。

sentences.english: Two-year carcinogenicity studies in rats and mice have also been completed.
sentences.chinese: 使用大小鼠进行的两年致癌性研究也已经完成。

definition: Aspergillus flavus (fungus typically found on crops)
to become cancerous/transformation to malignancy (of body cells)
